course_title: Special Topics in Chemistry: Machine Learning in Chemistry
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 25 / Seats Avail: 16Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Machine Learning has become widely used in many branches of Chemistry.  This capstone course will survey these, following an introduction to the basic ideas behind Machine Learning as contained in a book such as 'An Introduction to Statistical Learning'.  Students will present projects based on the recent chemical literature.  Some familiarity with software such as Mathematica, Matlab, Python, etc. will be very helpful.
course_description: A seminar for advanced students on topics of current interest in chemistry.
sections: Class Nbr: 2899, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 9:40-10:55a, Instructor: J. Bowman, Status: Open
